thread.title: Adele Tearfully Dedicates Album of the Year Grammy to Beyonce (Video)
thread.title_full: Adele Tearfully Dedicates Album of the Year Grammy to Beyonce (Video)

author: Just Jared
title: Adele Tearfully Dedicates Album of the Year Grammy to Beyonce (Video)
text:
Adele and Beyonce shared such a sweet moment after 25 won Album of the Year at the 2017 Grammys .
The 28-year-old entertainer dedicated the win to Beyonce ‘s Lemonade instead, and things got emotional. Adele expressed to Beyonce how much the album meant to her and her life, and Beyonce got visibly teary as well.
“I can’t possibly accept this award,” Adele explained to the audience as she began her speech.
Watch Adele ‘s speech in its entirety below…
Adele wins Album of the Year, dedicates it to Beyonce: "I can't possibly accept this award." #GRAMMYs pic.twitter.com/9Msjhz9Cj6 
— Hollywood Reporter (@THR) February 13, 2017
